meta.description: Optimize the production of medication patches and anti-biotic creams to maximize the number of people treated.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by the hospital.

params.name: time_required
params.description: Time required to prepare each product in minutes.

params.name: materials_required
params.description: Materials required to prepare each product in units.

params.name: treatment_capacity
params.description: Number of people treated per batch of each product.

vars.name: batches
vars.description: Number of batches to produce for each product.

objective.name: max_people_treated
objective.description: Maximize the number of people that can be treated.

constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: Total preparation time cannot exceed available staff time.

constraints.name: materials_constraint
constraints.description: Total materials used cannot exceed available materials.

constraints.name: storage_constraint
constraints.description: Total number of batches cannot exceed storage capacity.

constraints.name: demand_constraint
constraints.description: At least twice as many anti-biotic creams as medication patches must be produced.
